tool_description: Evaluates medication-related risks including drug interactions, contraindications, and adverse effects based on patient profile.

medical_conditions.description: Current medical conditions affecting drug selection

kidney_function.description: Kidney function status: normal, mild_impairment, moderate_impairment, severe_impairment

liver_function.description: Liver function status: normal, mild_impairment, moderate_impairment, severe_impairment

error_messages: Mismatched medication arrays: current_medications and dosages arrays must have equal length
Invalid medication name: One or more medications not found in drug database
Invalid dosage format: Dosages must include numeric value and unit
Invalid organ function status: Use normal, mild_impairment, moderate_impairment, or severe_impairment
Age incompatible with medications: Some medications are contraindicated for patient age group
usage: Provide current_medications and dosages arrays with patient demographics. Optionally include allergies, medical_conditions, and organ function status for comprehensive assessment.

overall_medication_risk.description: Overall medication risk level: low, moderate, high, critical

dosage_adjustments.description: Recommended dosage adjustments based on organ function
